actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require State agencies to carry out a workfare program applicable to households participating in the food stamp program.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 regarding the food stamp workfare program to: (1) make such program mandatory; and (2) give program responsibility to the State agency administering the food stamp program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require State agencies to carry out a workfare program applicable to households participating in the food stamp program.
